Claim: "Two women are taking care of a herd of animals."
Implication: "The two women are near a building made primarily of stone."
Referring expressions: Two women, herd of animals.  Two women, building, stone
Formula: (exists a (exists b (IsTakingCareOf(a,b)))) -> (exists c (exists a (IsNear(a,c) and IsMadePrimarilyOfStone(c))))
